content:
Today I chose PR 15874 for discussion!

doc(Order/InitialSeg): Improve documentation
Created by @Violeta Hernández (@vihdzp) on 2024-08-16
Labels: documentation, t-order

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Still relevant, has undergone a lot of review, and is IMO in a mergeable state or nearly so.
Violeta Hernández has marked this topic as resolved.
